about_the_game:
Test your skills and become the champion of the Universal Games!
The galaxy is watching you in this once-in-a-millennium competition. 

Step into the world of OMEXYAN, where movement, rhythm, and skill rule the arena! Feel the adrenaline in this dynamic VR game that challenges your reflexes and precision.

-Dive into the world of OMEXYAN, where reflexes, precision, and skill dominate in an exciting VR adventure!

Use the color-catching devices in your hands to collect incoming red and green orbs. Then, control two colorful remote devices to aim at and hit the matching-colored cubes accurately. In the third challenge, wield a sporty laser weapon to shoot the correct-colored targets with precision.

Earn points, unlock new levels and arenas, and face increasingly challenging and diverse tasks. With a fast-paced soundtrack accompanying your gameplay, OMEXYAN ensures you’re fully immersed in a dynamic and thrilling experience.

This game focuses on skill-based challenges and dynamic VR gameplay, offering exciting and captivating entertainment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: intel i5-7500 /AMD Ryzen 5 1600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD RX 580 6 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DrectX
  • VR Support: OpenXR Compatible VR Headsets

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
